nodes.text: The STAP Emissary was a hoverbike model produced by Longspur and Alloi during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

The Longspur STAP Emissary was first added to BioWare's massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on November 17, 2015 as one of the items in the Force Alliance Pack on the Cartel Market.
